headline: Workiva Appoints Barbara Larson as EVP & Chief Financial Officer to Drive Operational Excellence
summary: NEW YORK, December 10, 2025--Workiva Inc. (NYSE:WK), a leading, AI-powered platform for transparency, accountability, and trust, today announced the appointment of Barbara Larson as EVP & Chief Financial Officer, effective January 20, 2026.
